org.apache.batik.dom.svg
Interface SVGPathContext

All Superinterfaces:
SVGContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
SVGPathElementBridge
public interface SVGPathContext
extends SVGContext

Context class for the SVG path element to support extra methods.
